helpText: ø_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________å.

generic.title: ø_Error updating categories__________________________å
generic.message: ø_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________å.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ø_Error updating categories__________________________å
maxDepthExceeded.message: ø_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________å.

destinationHasSameName.title: ø_Error updating categories__________________________å
destinationHasSameName.message: ø_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________å.

noSchema.title: ø_Schema not found_________________å
noSchema.message: ø_Item schema not found for user_________________å.

maxCharacter.title: ø_Error updating categories__________________________å
maxCharacter.message: ø_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________å.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ø_Delete category________________å
deleteInUseCategory.message: ø_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________å.

custom.title: ø_Custom categories__________________å
custom.message: ø_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________å.

arcgis.title: ø_ArcGIS categories__________________å
arcgis.message: ø_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________å.

iso.title: ø_ISO categories_______________å
iso.message: ø_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________å.

inspire.title: ø_INSPIRE categories___________________å
inspire.message: ø_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________å.
